Their chicken is also surprising SUPER juicy,and not dry at all, and their beef is always done RIGHT, which sometimes it's very hard to get even at a steakhouse. It's really sad that they are changing the restaurant again as they can't seem to keep up the business with fine dining (not enough of a niche here i suppose). The owners also own Amici in Whitby and Pickering which is also just as good :) Love the atmosphere and the amazing food! Gem in hiding.. will miss you~

I"ve been to Phoenix a few times in the past. Usually I like coming here for breakfast. They have a wide variety of breakfast options available, but they do end at 11am so be sure your order is in before that time! I tried their Satay beef with vermicelli. I'ts pretty good, quite tasty, but nothing special in terms of flavour. They have a ham and egg plus pancake as an option. However, they don't serve syrup for you to put on ?! They give you honey instead, which is kinda hard, esp when our friend's kids were trying to dip it in honey and it was getting stuck. They need to serve syrup if they are going to serve pancakes. Milk tea and drinks were okay, nothing particularly good. They actually have some nice options at lunch/dinner too. There's a particular fried rice with shrimp/crab paste that is REALLY GOOD. All in all, just a regular chinese cafe, sometimes there's a lot of people so you have to wait for your table, but at least this location (bayview) has more seating than the woodbine location.

Have been here a few times now, once for my birthday and twice for tasting menu~ overall their food is very good. The sushi is pretty good but I have a pickier taste, rolls were quite good, their sushi particularly blowtorch is great! Their seafood fried rice is ADDICTIVE. I swear when you eat it you can't stop! Also their skewers are quite yummy. Sashimi could be cut into smaller pieces... But their tuna tar tar is very good. Tasting menu isn't too expensive either but you have to talk to the owners ahead of time and the budget you have in mind~ they do have blowtorch sushi but you have to request coz it's not on the menu. But definitely quite yummy if you like Asian fusion food!

My fiance was doing a story on their restaurant and had gotten two burgers and some sides (coleslaw and mac and cheese) to go and surprised me with dinner last night! I tried both their original burger and their brisket burger. The original burger was tasty, but a bit disappointing because the patty was quite dry, and i like my patties more moist in burgers. I then tried the brisket burger and it did not disappoint! their brisket was really good. added a bit of mother and B&B sauce and a hint of mustard and this was a really great! the mac and cheese was quite tasty, but it wasn't anything like "wow". Their coleslaw was quite refreshing and i like that it's purple :) Anyway would definitely want to come back to this place for burgers but mostly for the brisket one :) and would want to also try their brisket poutine!

Made a reservation for Sunday, in advance and said we were celebrating hubby's birthday, ok.  We get there and I tell the hostess that we are celebrating a birthday to make sure she notes in to the wait staff.  No mention from our waitress, Michelle?  She takes our order and everything comes out after a too long wait.  Good thing we sat on patio to distract us from the wait time.  The hostess "supervisor" wearing a red suit walked to every table except ours to greet.  It felt as though because we weren't white, we were ignored!  Still trying to have a good time on top of all this, and I go out to hostess to remind them we were celebrating a birthday and she notes it to server.   I quietly tell server it's a birthday for my husband and she says it's all covered.  We order dessert to share thinking my husband would receive something special...nothing came, we even got to the point of paying for our bill.  I mention to server and she says, "oh, they didn't bring something?"  Duh, who is "they" isn't it you!  If we didn't already pay our bill I would have left NO tip!  I didn't want to make a scene and complain to a manager because we are celebrating a birthday!  The service was extremely slow, for the two of us, because everyone that was seated with us and after had already left! IIf it weren't for the fountain show our special evening would be disastrous memory.  Btw:  whoever answers the phones, learn how to have better phone etiquette, you sound very unprofessional and the tone of your voice is unbecoming of a Todd English establishment.

Update 5/28/17
What's up with the bad reviews?  We didn't want to eat here because of it but decided to check it out since we were staying at the hotel.   This was memorial Sunday and it was crowded!  The food is just as good as before and I still LOVE the char siu pork.  Lean with no fat but not dry.  Paid the extra for seafood but really it wasn't necessary cuz they served snow crab as a regular buffet.  The dessert station still great and the server in the VIP room was awesome bringing new drinks and keeping a clean table!  And BTW,  Bachannal still leaves all the dirty dishes on the table!!

Wow, what a discovery!!  We had the orange "chicken" and delicious crispy spicy eggplant.  Everything on the menu is meat free...what a joy for vegans!  Can't wait to try everything on their menu.  I just don't know how Chef Kenny does it!  The customer service is a plus as well...you have got to try it, you'll definitely love it!

Love this place!  Finding good vegan options when traveling is difficult at best.  The suggestion I have for the owner/chef is to put the chicken and waffles on the menu all day every day.  Very disappointed that we couldn't order this on Sunday... When everyone eats brunch style in the mornings.  We were from California and really wanted to try it

The worst place ever!!! People that was sitting next to us was intoxicated and broke a glass and shattered on my daughter's leg. Manager came and seemed sympathetic but didn't do anything about it. Payed for our whole amount and left. The worst service ever. This place sucks!!!

My review is more about Mercedes-Benz Co.  Did you know that the parts they take out of your car are rebuild and sold to others who have that model.  Also all the parts of the car are not German made by them.   If you want your part that is being replaced you may be charged for it.  WHY when you purchased the car you paid for all parts!!!!!   The part they replaced was #204-900-59-12 control unit E  2010 C class cost of part $434.20, labor are you ready....$672.00 YIKES!!  The cost of the part is $269.00 for a new one!!!
 Schumacher gave me a report of what I need to fix a fog light cost is $573!!!!!!  For a light!!!
When I asked for the part of 204-901-23-00 Control unit, Cost $ 1021.  When I asked for this part I got half of it for them to satisfy me the part came from Continental Instruction KIT!!
They must of charged me all this labor cost for they had to read the instructions !!!!  Why they charge so much for labor.  Go to one Mercedes dealership they will give you a list of what is wrong with your car, go to other and the list is totally different!!!  I'm a women and must may think I will pay so they can PLAY.

The best BBQ I have had in Vegas!!!
You have to try this little hidden gem
 Two thumbs up!!!!!

First time to write a review for a really nice place. The all you can eat sushi makes me so happy and satisfied. Much better than most expansive buffets in Las Vegas strip! Not only oysters and sea urchin, every appetizer will simply amaze you. Definitely come here again next time.

The man who wiped down my car afterwards was not trying to get it clean. I had to go home and clean it again. When I asked him if certain spots could come clean he rubbed a rag on it and said no. When I got home, I did the same and all the dirty spots came clean. I learned a lesson.
I have been a client for years and have moved a few times. These guys always come out right when I need them and are very thorough. Reasonably priced and they really do care about customer loyalty.

I went to different great clips  and wasn't pleased. I found out the great clips in Chandler on Alma school and Elliott  are very good. I have had no trouble there. Everyone does hair real well and I am pleased. I had Sara recently and she is very good to. She is a sweet person. I will recommend this great clips to anyone.

It was my first time here and I was very impressed.  Leigh Ann was great. My hair has never looked better. I will keep going back to her. I highly recommend her to anyone that is looking for a great person and stylist. Thanks again. See you next time.

This is a real good place to eat. Everyone is so friendly. You feel welcome when you come in. We moved from Illinois and it has been our favorite place to eat.
We will keep coming back. Cassandra is the very best waitress and we love her. Need to definitely keep her.
Their food and service were good.  The sampler was a bit pricey but if you order from the menu then it is not so bad.  Good German food.

The pro would be that the staff are friendly.  The young man behind the counter was polite and helpful.  So the staff was the best part of our experience.

Now for the food.  The burgers were ok.  My wife's burger said it had bacon but there was none.  The barbeque sauce was not very good.  She also ordered Onion Rings and they were to crispy and the sauce that came with them was not very good (tasted like a bad thousand island dressing.  My fries were ok but they were very thin and obviously had been frozen.
  
The worst part of the meal was the $6.00 for each shakes.  My wife ordered the triple  chocolate which came with powered chocolate on top and was just to strong for even a triple.  I ordered a strawberry which was totally uneatable.  I had marshmallows on top and some terrible spice mixed in that made it so bad after one taste I had to put it down.  $12 for shakes that we could not eat.  I was expecting great things from such pricey ice cream.

Our whole bill came to over $35 and we both said we could have had a much better meal for that price.  I do not mind spending money on food if it is worth it but clearly this food was not.  I wish we had checked Yelp before we decided to try it.
Went back for second try it is was great!  The soups were hot and service was fast.  The manager fix a minor problem with the bill.  Over all great improvement!
My wife bought her new sprint cell from Doug at this Costco.  Doug was so helpful and we got the best deal in town from Costco.  Great Job Costco.

A great place if you really, really are a yogurt lover!  My favorite is the original tart but all the flavors are great.  It is worth the trip and it is right next door to a great Mexican restaurant (Cafe Rio). I have tried them all here in Vegas but this is the best.  It is a small friendly place.  If you like real Yogurt, this is the place to get it.

I went with my wife and friend.We all three had different items and all of them were very bland and had very little flavor.  We spent $50 ( with the tip) and felt we had received very little for the money.  I had not been to a Carrabba's in a few years and it maybe a century before I would try it again.  Don't waste your money.  The Blue Beer was great but then again they did not make it.

Food is great and service outstanding.  My wife had the crepes and I had the tradional breakfast.  Both were good and enjoyable .  The young man who served us as friendly and helpful.  We will be back.  Nice to have a local breakfast place here in Henderson.  Give it a try.
Went for restaurant week and the food was great.  The service was exceptional.  We will be back.  They also have a good selection of draft beers.
For being a fast food restaurant Freddies is very good. The service is very good and fast. Custard is excellent.

My wife and I were very happy with our selections. I had the cold brewed coffee and it was excellent. My wife does not like coffee but she did enjoy their pastries. We plan on attending the grand opening on Saturday.

I am a man and have very hard toenails to work on. Jackie does a wonderful job the best I've ever had. If you have problems with your feet I would recommend this salon. Jackie takes her time and does a great job. she has completely straightened out my problem feet.

I could not believe that my wife was ask to open her purse.  They said the reason was because of the shooting in Colorado.  The guy there brought his weapons in through an exit door not in a purse.  It looks like I will be using Red Box more and skipping the worthless searches.  I guess all the Regal  theaters are doing this but cannot verify it.  The staff said it was company policy.  What is next our churches, Malls, ....

my wife and I really enjoyed our visit to this establishment. I had the bison burger which was excellent. I also had the best sweet potato fries I have ever had. we definitely will be back. I have eaten at the same restaurant on the other side of town and it was just as good.

Got a GREAT massage from Peter.  It was outstanding, very professional, and well done.  It was one of the best massages, if not the best, I have ever had.  I will be back again and again.  My wife talked me into getting one and boy am I glad I listened to her.  This is not your average massage, but one that you will remember and want to have again.  See you again soon Peter!

Over all our experience was very positive.  The on big failure was the Lava Cake desert.   It had no Lava and was cold in the middle.  Even the waitress mention the lack of Lava but she did not offer to bring another desert.   We, for our part, did not request this, even though we certainly should have.  I think some times items were left on the warming table too long  and were somewhat cool.  The mashed potatoes were cold and did not have a great flavor.  Over all, however, it was a nice dinning experience and one we would repeat (being more vocal on those things we thought need improvement.

We had the chicken-fried steak which tasted like the grease was old and the gravy was very salty. We also had fish and chips which were really really bad overcooked and the insides were mushy. Overall it was a very bad experience and we will not return.

Great service and nice atmosphere.  Coffee great!  At the top of watet street.
They alzo have rolls and small menu.
This legendary sandwich shop is now closed. Owners are moving to Austin.

The new dining room is really nice and it seems like they are way more consistent eating in that take-out. Their steak taco is quite a bit of food for $5.75. Too bad it's table service only or I'd eat-in more often but adding tax+tip increases the cost of eating there makes that $5.75 taco $7.

Every time it snows you can be sure Brennan's will not shovel their sidewalk. It's been 4-5 days since it snowed and there's pure ice in front of their storefront. It's the same every time it snows. A business that does not care about the community is not one I am willing to support.
You really can't beat Villa Y Zapata for the price. Fresh, good quality, and cheap. I've had both the wet burrito and the steak fajitas and they were excellent and very filling.
First time at Pieology Pizzeria and I was impressed. Friendly service, short wait and delicious pizza. My only regret is that I didn't order a larger pizza. I will go back!
The food was fantastic, the new menu is great, the new attire is awesome, the maple pecan sweet mashed patoato is out of this world, Ross was too cool.
This place is awesome, I enjoyed the excellent quality food, the service was awesome , happy servers= happy customers, thanks Natasha for make this a great experience. ..

Called them and spoke to someone Who sounded like a teenager and did not care that I was inquiring about services. I asked if they had any availability for this week. She said that they didn't and then I stated "ok, I will give someone else a call as I am looking for something this week." She then stated that she could get me in on Wednesday between 12 and 4. Now it's 4:10 and when I called and spoke with Jennifer asking where the electrician is they said the appointment never existed and they only have a record of me calling and leaving a message. The previous person took my address and all of my info. When I told Jennifer how frustrated I was she didn't offer any solutions just to "have a nice day".
I took work off for this. Horrible customer service, horrible scheduling staff.
Worst most overpriced place ever.. horrible food and inconvenient service. Stay away!
